divs: sighting detailsit was a social night in the park for our pta meeting which brought parent and their kids. it was evening dark probably between 7 & 9pm cst i was just a youngester then 9-10 years old so year was either 1948 or 1949 (i think in the fall) i was playing a 'hide & go seek' game...hiding with a friend behind some pine trees (adults were there at the park for a parent\teacher meeting social.) i happened to look up and saw 5-6 bright nearly round white objects (seemed at the time that they were about the size of half-dollars loosely left to right..they dispersed... we were in an undeveloped area (at that time)...miles away from towns or developments. no one else including my friend, other kids or adults saw anything (a[[roximately 2-25 total at pta social). i was stunned and it seemed like minutes at the time...but on reflection more likely 20-30 seconds seeing them. after seeing them grouped i think breaking off from group going northerly and spreading out as they left. they were nearly if not stationary when i looked and saw them...they appeared to be about the size of 1\2 dollars or perhaps quarters. perhaps anywhere from 50 ft to 300ft high and impossible to remember or know how far away (perhaps 1\2 mile????or more. i was hiding behind a pine tree with a classmate....it seemed so long as i watched...finally i realized something very unusual was happening and i remember nudging my friend...bur by the time i did that ...they were gone. at that time i had never heard of a ufo or 'flying saucer'...i told my folks later that night and they just thought i was 'seeing things'...not...i have never 'seen' or 'imagined' anything else in my life. i didn't make a real big thing out of it...but in later years after i learned about ufos, i would bring it up from time to time to older friends and my folks (we no longer lived down there in the country). my mother on her death bed in 1988...told me among her last statements that "she was sorry that she had not believed me those many years ago." while that does not lend any credibility to my story...her statement helped bring my concern to a closure!!!
Summary: They were first grouped together looking like silver dollars or 1/2 dollars from the north
